section.title: Refreshing Virtual Machines and Templates
section.para: Refresh your virtual machines to get the latest data the provider or host can access. This includes information such as the power state, container, and hardware devices attached to the virtual machine.

step.para: Click the accordion for the items to analyze.

Click
(Configuration), and then
(Refresh Relationships and Power States) on the Virtual Machine Taskbar.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The console returns a refreshed list of the data associated with the selected virtual machines.
